title: Moonlight
lyrics:
You and me
Dal-i tteuneun bam gat-i haneul-eul balabollae
You and me
Neoui nunbich-eun naege hal mal-i manh-a boyeo

Geu nun-eul gamgo naege

Ibsul-eul yeol-eo mabeobcheoleom malhaejwo Baby



If you wanna love with me

Jom deo gakkai waseo nal balghyeojwo Baby



You already know about me

Aljanh-a naneun geujeo danji

Neowa gat-eun ma-eumppun-in geol



You already know about me

Aljanh-a naneun geujeo danji

Neowa gat-eun ma-eumppun-in geol



Kkamkkamhan eodum sog-eseo

Ojig hwanhage balghyeojuneun neoneun

Neon machi moonlight moonlight i gong-gan-eun

I can't stop my feeling

Ojig neowa nan Light and dark

No one else like you

Nan neo malgon amudo yeojalo an boyeo



Dal-i tteun i bam-e malhae jugessni?

Baby love me love me baby

Nae gyeot-eulo wa angyeojugessni?

Baby love me love me baby



Eodum sog-e neoleul jikyeojul teni

Baby love me love me baby

No one else like you

Nan neo malgon amudo yeojalo an boyeo Baby



I'm talking about

Neugdaeui bonseong-eul bon neoneun bwajul suga eobsne

Al-a i bam-e nal buleuneun salam-eun neogie

Domang-eun muuimihae geollimyeon deo tteugeobge

Geollimyeon chaeg-im-eun an jyeo neon Just defend yourself



Jeo dal-i nal kkeul-eodang-gineun bam-imyeon

Nae mam-e milmulcheoleom millyeooneun ne eolgul

Aega taseo jogeuman baeleul ttuiwoss-eo

I mellodie nae ma-eum sil-eoss-eo



You already know about me

Aljanh-a naneun geujeo danji

Neowa gat-eun ma-eumppun-in geol



You already know about me

Aljanh-a naneun geujeo danji

Neowa gat-eun ma-eumppun-in geol



Dal-i tteun i bam-e malhae jugessni?

Baby love me love me baby

Nae gyeot-eulo wa angyeojugessni?

Baby love me love me baby



Eodum sog-e neoleul jikyeojul teni

Baby love me love me baby

No one else like you

Nan neo malgon amudo yeojalo an boyeo Baby



My head my head is all about you

Nae meolie bijibgo deul-eoon neolaneun kkum

Du nun-eul gam-ado dalcheoleom tteooleuneun

Machi yuseongcheoleom nae pum-e tteol-eojineun neon



Neomu aleumdaun banchig

Geu juwien neugdaedeul-i neomu manhgessjiman

I bamdo ulin son-eul jabgo gat-i

Deo gachi issneun il-eul mollae hal teni

Oneuldo nan jeo dal alaeseo "Awooo"



Dal-i tteun i bam-e malhae jugessni?

Baby love me love me baby

Nae gyeot-eulo wa angyeojugessni?

Baby love me love me baby



Eodum sog-e neoleul jikyeojul teni

Baby love me love me baby

No one else like you

Nan neo malgon amudo yeojalo an boyeo Baby
